rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. When you do, proliferate. [i](You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another kind of a counter already there.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]If there is a cost to the Kelian League's automation, it is out of sight and out of mind. As far as the world knows, there is no price of progress.[/i]
